phrases.phrase: Renders a section displaying the latest media gallery albums in the activity summary email.
Renders a section displaying the latest media gallery comments in the activity summary email.
Renders a section displaying the latest media gallery items in the activity summary email.
Mentions you in an album description
Gives you permission to add media to a personal album
Gives you permission to view a personal album
Comments on a watched media item or album
Mentions you in a media or album comment
Quotes your media or album comment
Reacts to your media or album comment
Adds a new media item to a watched album or category
Mentions you in a media item description
Rates your media item or album
Covers view media categories or the list of categories.
Covers updating or creating a media category.
Covers hard-deleting media, albums and their comments.
Covers viewing media, albums, and their comments.
Covers creating, updating and soft-deleting media, albums and their comments.
BB code for displaying gallery media items and albums.
Gallery comment removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Media item removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Only show media added within the last X days
Require comment when rating albums or media items
The maximum number of albums to show per page.
If personal albums are disabled, albums can still be created inside album categories (if you create some). Personal albums allow the album owner to have granular control over privacy settings.
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded for audio. Use spaces or line breaks between extensions.
The maximum number of media or album comments to show per page.
This value will be used as the default view privacy value for any new personal albums being created.
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded for images. Use spaces or line breaks between extensions.
If enabled, clicking on a media item in a list of media will open it in the lightbox where you can navigate through the list quickly and view information about and comment on the media.

If you have a large gallery, your media index or category view pages may load slowly. This option will mitigate that to only show media from the last X days. Set to 0 for unlimited. You can also control this on a per-category basis.
The maximum number of media items to show per page.
If you'd like for media items in personal albums to have a minimum number of tags, set that here. Set to 0 for no minimum.
The style selected here will be displayed on all Gallery pages instead of the default style.
If checked all users who wish to rate an album or media item will be required to also write a comment.

When adding media to the gallery, a thumbnail is created based on these dimensions. Album thumbnails are built to the same dimensions. If you change this value, you will need to rebuild the thumbnails.
If enabled, the count of unviewed media will display above the "Media" navigation tab.
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded for videos. Use spaces or line breaks between extensions.
To automatically watermark all uploaded images, enable watermarks and upload an appropriate image with a transparent background. Results will vary depending on the image chosen.
Options that control the media gallery add-on.
Add / edit note on own image
Bypass album privacy (view all albums and contents)
Delete tag of yourself on any image
Time limit on editing/deleting own albums (minutes)
Time limit on editing/deleting own comments (minutes)
Time limit on editing/deleting own media items (minutes)
Use inline moderation on media items
Manage tags by others on own media items
Add / edit tag of yourself on any image
Add tag of others without approval
Add/remove watermark from any media items
Add/remove watermark from own media items
A node style category list can be displayed while browsing the gallery.
A number of properties to control the appearance of XenForo Media Gallery
Displays a slider showing the most recent or a random selection of albums.
Displays a slider showing the most recent or a random selection of media items.
Below the "Gallery navigation" inside the gallery wrapper template.
The 'aac' or 'libvo_aacenc' encoder is required for transcoding audio.
Enter the names above of the members who are allowed to add media items. The album owner is always permitted automatically.
The album is being created inside the "{title}" category. It will be visible to any member who can view this category.
Unfortunately, the media item you uploaded named {title} could not be processed. Please upload a different file and try again.
Your media item {title} has finished processing and has now been added to the gallery.
All media items marked as viewed.
All selected albums are already in the destination category. Please select another category.
All selected media items are already in the destination album. Please select another album.
All selected media items are already in the destination category. Please select another category.
The types selected above are only relevant to album and media categories.
Cannot ascertain the correct album or category to save media to.
Cannot create media note without a tagged username or note text.
Cannot delete contents without an album_id.
Cannot delete contents without a category_id.
Cannot find watermark image at provided path.
Cannot move album into a non-album category.

If you have a large category, your category view page may load slowly. This option will mitigate that to only show media from the last X days. If the option is checked and a value is set here it will always override the value from the global option. Set to 0 for unlimited.
A category of type "album" or "media" must support at least one media type.
The category type can only be changed when the category is empty.
To change the watermark on existing images you need to run the XFMG: Update media watermarks job.
Change who can add media items:
Change who can view media items:
Changing the privacy settings in this way will overwrite all existing privacy settings in the selected albums.
Comment on media album {albumTitle} by {userName}
Comment on media {mediaTitle} by {userName}
Container categories are special categories that cannot directly contain albums or media items, but instead will display items from their child categories.
Copy URL BB code with thumbnail
Could not execute FFmpeg at the path specified.
Could not find FFmpeg at the path specified.
Crop data provided indicates there are no valid manipulations to apply.
Only media from viewable albums will be displayed.
Display pager buttons below the slider.
The maximum number of slides displayed at a time can be flexible depending on viewport size. If checked, leave fields blank or 0 to not change the value for a particular breakpoint.
Ensure you have added at least one media item before continuing.
Enter the full path to the folder containing your Photopost files. This path must be readable to import media items.
Enter the full path to the folder containing your vBulletin attachments. This path must be readable to import media items.
Enter the path to the FFmpeg binary on this server. You can sometimes find this with the command which ffmpeg.
If enabled, thumbnails will be automatically generated where possible.
FFmpeg has access to neither the libvo_aacenc codec or the aac codec.
This is the maximum number of transcode processes that will be allowed to run simultaneously. When the limit is reached, subsequent transcode processes will be queued.
FFmpeg version 1.1.0 or above is required.
Field can be edited while adding media
Field can be used in personal albums
The file you have uploaded is {size} which exceeds your storage quota and cannot be uploaded. You have {remaining} remaining.
Transcoding a video will also compress and optimize the resulting file for streaming. This will reduce load times and file size. With this option checked, all uploaded videos will be transcoded.
If enabled, a higher resolution thumbnail will be automatically generated where possible. This is displayed before audio or video starts playing.
If you wish to leave a comment with this rating, enter a message above. The rating and comment will be displayed publicly.
The items displayed on this page are being displayed from child categories.
Specify the maximum number of gallery comments that should be shown in this widget.
The 'libx264' encoder is required for transcoding video.
Allow slider to loop back to the beginning when the end is reached.
This is the maximum number of slides that will be shown at a time.
Media item is contained within a deleted album.

Media items will be automatically created in the selected category from attachments posted in this forum. Media will be accessible to anyone that can view this category, regardless of whether they can view the original attachment.
{media} - New media item in watched album
{media} - New media item in watched category
Members who have reacted to comment by {user}
This allows you to require users to enter at least this many tags when adding media or editing tags on existing media.
Media items will be automatically created for attachments posted in the selected forums. Media will be accessible to anyone that can view this category, so do not select private forums!
Must be an album category or select 'No category' to make the album(s) uncategorised (personal albums).
New comment on watched media item
The new thumbnail could not be processed. Please try another image.
No album could be found with the ID {album_id}.
No album ID could be found from that URL.
No albums have been added yet.
No albums have been added yet which you can add media to.
No items have been added yet.
No media has been added to this album which matches your filters.
No media has been added to this album yet.
No media has been added yet.
No media or albums have been added to this category yet.
No one has rated this content yet.
Notify members watching the destination album
Notify members watching the destination category
This is the total number of media items that will be loaded in the slider.
One or more of your uploaded items needs to be processed before they can be added to the gallery. You will receive an alert once processing is finished for each item.
Only categories which contain "Media items only" are available. To move the media item to an album use the option below.
Only non-animated images can be watermarked.
Only show media added within the last X days
The pasted text does not appear to be a valid URL.
The path provided was not valid.
If auto-play is enabled, pause when hovering over the slider.
A personal album can use advanced privacy settings and will not appear in any category.
Attempt to match Photopost username and email address to an existing user in this forum.
Photopost was integrated with other forum software (not XenForo) which has since been imported into this forum. A forum import log is required.
Photopost integration source must be configured.

Photopost was not integrated and user details were stored in Photopost itself. If there is no attempt to match to an existing user, or a user cannot be found, content will be attributed to a guest user.
Photopost was integrated with a XenForo installation. If no forum import log is provided, it is assumed that the user IDs in Photopost match those in this forum.
PHP binary path could not be verified.
Please confirm that you want to delete the following category
Please confirm that you want to set your avatar to the following
The 'png' encoder is required for generating thumbnails.
A problem occurred while creating the temp media. Please try another URL.
{user} tagged you in media {item}. Visit your account to approve this.
Rating your own content is considered cheating.
Requested album could not be found.
Requested category could not be found.
Requested comment could not be found.
Requested media item could not be found.
RSS feed for all media from {board}
RSS feed for all media in album {album}
RSS feed for all media in category {category}
The selected album/category does not support this media type.
Stop notification emails from all albums
Stop notification emails from all media

Running this will update the attachment media mirrors to match the current settings. This may create additional media items, remove ones that are no longer applicable, or move existing ones to a different category.
There is no media matching your filters.
There is no media or albums matching your filters.
There are more comments to display.
There are no albums matching your filters.
There are no comments to display.
There are no media items to display.
This file is not encoded in a supported format and cannot be transcoded. Please upload a different file.
This is the total number of albums that will be loaded in the slider.
This media needs to be processed before it can be added to the gallery. You will receive an alert once processing is finished.
This rating will replace your previous rating.
Note: This will also update the poster image for this media item.
If selected, this option will rebuild the existing thumbnail, if available. If a custom thumbnail has been uploaded it will be deleted.
The time limit to delete this album ({editLimit} minutes) has expired.
The time limit to delete this comment ({editLimit} minutes) has expired.
The time limit to delete this media ({editLimit} minutes) has expired.
The time limit to edit this album ({editLimit} minutes) has expired.
The time limit to edit this comment ({editLimit} minutes) has expired.
The time limit to edit this media ({editLimit} minutes) has expired.
To transcode media we need to defer the processing to a command line script which will be executed by the PHP binary specified. You can sometimes find this with the command which php.
If enabled, this will allow you to support more formats by transcoding media to H.264 / AAC / MP3 where required.
Transcoded media item uploaded by {username} named {title} failed to be created.
Media item uploaded by {username} named {title} failed to be transcoded.
Unable to edit the selected image. Please try again.
User has added at least X media items
User has created at least X albums
Enter the names above of the members who are allowed to view media items. The album owner is always permitted automatically.
{author} commented on an album you are watching at {board_title}.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the media item "{album}" at {board} with email notification of new media items or new comments.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this album or disable all emails.
{author} added a media item to an album you are watching at {board}.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the category "{category}" at {board} with email notification of new media items.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this category or disable all emails.
{author} added a media item to a category you are watching at {board}.
{author} commented on a media item you are watching at {board_title}.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the media item "{media}" at {board} with email notification of new comments.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this media item or disable all emails.
{name} has not added any albums which match your filters.
{name} has not added any albums yet.
{name} has not added any media which matches your filters.
{name} has not added any media yet.
{user} mentioned you in a comment on album {album}.
{user} mentioned you in a comment on media item {media}.
{username} posted a comment on the album {title}.
{username} posted a comment on the media item {title}.
{user} quoted your comment on media item {media}.
{user} reacted to your comment on album {album} with {reaction}.
{user} reacted to your comment on media item {media} with {reaction}.
{user} reacted to {author}'s comment on album {album} with {reaction}.
{user} reacted to {author}'s comment on media item {media} with {reaction}.
{user} has shared their album {item} with you and you are now able to add media to it.
{user} has shared their album {item} with you.
{user} tagged you in media {item}. You can either {approve} or {reject} this tag.
You can embed media from various BB code media sites
You can not add media to container categories.
You do not have permission to add media to this album.
You do not have permission to add media to this category.
You have no unread comments. You may read all latest comments instead.
You have no unviewed media. You may view all latest media instead.
You may only import from XenForo Media Gallery {version}.
You must specify a title to create a new album for these media items before continuing.
You are not watching any albums.
You are not watching any media items.
You are only permitted to tag yourself in this media item.
You are required to leave a comment when rating.
Are you sure you want to add a watermark to {total} media item(s)?
Are you sure you want to change the privacy of {total} album(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete {total} album(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete {total} comment(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete {total} media item(s)?
Are you sure you want to mark all media viewed?
Are you sure you want to mark this album viewed?
Are you sure you want to mark this category viewed?
Are you sure you want to move {total} album(s)?
Are you sure you want to move {total} media item(s)?
Are you sure you want to remove the watermark from {total} media item(s)?
Are you sure you want to stop watching all albums?
Are you sure you want to stop watching all media?
Are you sure you want to unwatch this album?
Are you sure you want to unwatch this media item?
Are you sure you want to update your alert settings for all albums?
Are you sure you want to update your alert settings for all media?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all albums?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all media?
You will be shown a list of all albums that you can add media to.
Your browser is not able to play this audio.
Your comment on the album {title} was deleted.
Your comment on the album {title} was edited.
Your comment on the media item {title} was deleted.
Your comment on the media item {title} was edited.
Your reply to the album {title} was submitted.
Your reply to the media item {title} was submitted.
